body.p: The HTML pages that compose a WebHelp Responsive output are obtained after processing the HTML template pages.
Depending on their function, there are four types of template pages:

ol.li: Main page template used to produce the home page of the WebHelp Responsive output.
Topic template used to generate the HTML pages associated with a topic.
Search results template used to generate the HTML page that presents the search results.
Index terms template used when generating the HTML page that presents the documentation index terms.
